description:
Show a gallery of pre-configured dossier templates (bilateral relations, regional analysis, thematic brief) with thumbnail previews. Users can click to preview full structure before creating their first dossier.

**Rationale:** Dossiers are the primary artifact in this system. Without examples, users may struggle to understand what constitutes a good dossier structure. Visual templates accelerate learning and ensure consistency across the organization.
title: Dossier Empty State with Template Previews
